title: Orihuela Costa – Costa Blanca
description: Living room with open kitchen equipped with all comforts such as microwave, convection oven, dishwasher, washing machine, and dryer, 1 bedroom with a double bed, 1 bedroom with 2 single beds, 2 bathrooms with showers, sink, and toilet, enclosed indoor terrace, and large sunny rooftop terrace.
